#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
#define f(i,a,b) for (int i = a; i < b; i++ )
#define rf(i,a,b) for (int i = a; i >= b; i-- )

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
     if (b == 0) {
        return a;
    }
    else {
        return gcd(b, a % b);
    } 
}

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int ans=0;
			
		f(i,1,n)
		{
			if(gcd(n,i)==1)
				ans++;
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
